    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Assignment> getAll()
        This methode returns all Assigment that are stored in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all assignments.

      • getById

        public java.util.List<Assignment> getById​(long memberId,
                                          long eventId)
        This is the methode return a list with the assignment for a certain event and a certain crewMember.
        Parameters:
        eventId - this the id of the event.
        memberId - this the id of the crewMember.
        Returns:
        list of assigment where there is both member and event are part of. Usually one assignment. (Since memberId, evenId are primary key.)

      • getByMemberId

        public java.util.List<Assignment> getByMemberId​(long memberId)
        This methode gets all the assigment where a certain crewMember is part of.
        Parameters:
        memberId - this is an id of the crew.
        Returns:
        a list of assignments, where memberId is part of.

      • getByEventId

        public java.util.List<Assignment> getByEventId​(long eventId)
        This methode gets all the assigment that are assigned to certain crewMembers.
        Parameters:
        eventId - this is an id of the event.
        Returns:
        a list of assignments, where eventId is part of.

      • existsById

        public boolean existsById​(long memberId,
                          long eventId)
        This methode checks if a member in combination with the eventId exist.
        Parameters:
        eventId - this is an id of the client.
        memberId - this is an id
        Returns:
        boolean if the id of memberId and eventId exist in the enrolment class.

      • save

        public boolean save​(Assignment assignment)
             throws javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException
        This methode takes care of saving the assigment to the database.
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assigment to be added
        Returns:
        boolean if the assignment have been added at the database or not.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the event from the assigment doesn't exist.
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the member from the assignment doesn't exist.
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the assigment already exist.

      • updateStatusById

        public boolean updateStatusById​(long memberId,
                                long eventId,
                                StatusPermission status)
        This methode update the Status by the id of crewMember and from event.
        Parameters:
        status - != null. the status is the one where it is needed to be changed too.
        memberId - is an id of a crewMember
        eventId - is an id of a event
        Returns:
        boolean if the update did succeed or not.

      • incrementKaakjes

        public boolean incrementKaakjes​(long memberId,
                                long eventId)
        This methode update the kaakjes counter by 1the id of crewMember and from event.
        Parameters:
        memberId - is an id of a crewMember
        eventId - is an id of a event
        Returns:
        boolean if the update did succeed or not.

      • deleteById

        public boolean deleteById​(long memberId,
                          long eventId)
        Delete the assigment by id from memberId and eventId
        Parameters:
        memberId - is the id of the crewMember.
        eventId - is the id of the event
        Returns:
        boolean if the assigment was successfully deleted.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the assigment doesn't exist.
